doc.str: A method for an industrial or medical process which employs radiation imaging to monitor progress of the process, in which a combination of parameters derived from the image is used to calculate output signals to enhance control of the process

BECK M S ET AL: "PROCESS TOMOGRAPHY - THE STATE OF THE ART" TRANSACTIONS OF THE INSTITUTE OF MEASUREMENT AND CONTROL, INSTITUTE OF MEASUREMENT AND CONTROL.
